decision_conditions: The London Borough of Ealing objects to the proposal on the grounds that the Council have been unable to properly assess the impact of the proposal on the existing users of the sports ground and the amenity of the neighbouring residents, contrary to London Plan (2016) Policies 3.16, 3.19 and 7.18; Ealing's Development Strategy 2026 (DPD)(2012) Policy 5.6; and Ealing's Development Management (DPD)(2013) Policies 7D and EA. | The London Borough of Ealing objects to the proposal due to the absence of a thorough and robust Transport Statement and Travel Plan which incorporates the impact upon the highway network within LB Ealing and potential conflicts with the established surrounding context of the proposed off-site play space at Twyford Avenue Sports Ground, contrary to London Plan (2016) Policies 6.3, 6.8, 6.9, 6.10, 6.11, 6.12 and 6.13; Ealing's Development Strategy 2026 (DPD)(2012) Policies 1.1(f), 1.2 and 2.1; and Ealing's Development Management (DPD)(2013) Policy 6.13 (Ealing Local Variation).
